5#ifndef V8_COMPILER_FAST_API_CALLS_H_
6#define V8_COMPILER_FAST_API_CALLS_H_
7
8#include "include/v8-fast-api-calls.h"
9#include "src/compiler/graph-assembler.h"
10
11namespace v8 {
12namespace internal {
13namespace compiler {
14namespace fast_api_call {
15
16struct OverloadsResolutionResult {
17 static OverloadsResolutionResult Invalid() {
18 return OverloadsResolutionResult(-1, CTypeInfo::Type::kVoid);
19 }
20
21 OverloadsResolutionResult(int distinguishable_arg_index_,
22 CTypeInfo::Type element_type_)
23 : distinguishable_arg_index(distinguishable_arg_index_),
24 element_type(element_type_) {
25 DCHECK(distinguishable_arg_index_ < 0 ||
26 element_type_ != CTypeInfo::Type::kVoid);
27 }
28
29 bool is_valid() const { return distinguishable_arg_index >= 0; }
30
31 // The index of the distinguishable overload argument. Only the case where the
32 // types of this argument is a JSArray vs a TypedArray is supported.
33 int distinguishable_arg_index;
34
35 // The element type in the typed array argument.
36 CTypeInfo::Type element_type;
37
38 Node* target_address = nullptr;
39};
40
41ElementsKind GetTypedArrayElementsKind(CTypeInfo::Type type);
42
43OverloadsResolutionResult ResolveOverloads(
44 const FastApiCallFunctionVector& candidates, unsigned int arg_count);
45
46bool CanOptimizeFastSignature(const CFunctionInfo* c_signature);
47
48using GetParameter = std::function<Node*(int, OverloadsResolutionResult&,
49 GraphAssemblerLabel<0>*)>;
50using ConvertReturnValue = std::function<Node*(const CFunctionInfo*, Node*)>;
51using InitializeOptions = std::function<void(Node*)>;
52using GenerateSlowApiCall = std::function<Node*()>;
53
54Node* BuildFastApiCall(Isolate* isolate, Graph* graph,
55 GraphAssembler* graph_assembler,
56 const FastApiCallFunctionVector& c_functions,
57 const CFunctionInfo* c_signature, Node* data_argument,
58 const GetParameter& get_parameter,
59 const ConvertReturnValue& convert_return_value,
60 const InitializeOptions& initialize_options,
61 const GenerateSlowApiCall& generate_slow_api_call);
62
63} // namespace fast_api_call
64} // namespace compiler
65} // namespace internal
66} // namespace v8
67
68#endif // V8_COMPILER_FAST_API_CALLS_H_
